encounter.name: Three orcs in the tower
encounter.precis: These orcs have taken the tower via the postern gate. They hold it to stop anyone lighting the signal fire.
encounter.motivation: Light the fire to inform Cold Keep of the attack.
encounter.threats: Orcs will continue to arrive until the characters are overwhelmed.
encounter.treats: Once Cold Keep is notified they can escape.
encounter.progression: At this point the characters have achieved some form of success..

strategy.p: The orcs will stand and fight. They're expecting resistance and they know what they're supposed to do. They're just expecting the resistance from the coutyard so they're slightly surprised.

encounter.outs: The Orcs can be thrown off the tower.
